content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (20, 17), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "敵空母はマップの左上付近にいる可能性が高い。まずは航空部隊を発艦させ、索敵を行う。空母は安全な距離を保ちながら、少し北西に移動して索敵範囲を広げる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 15}, "launch_target": {"x": 5, "y": 5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (5, 5) while at (19, 14).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (19, 15), en route to target (18, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (19, 14), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1は順調に索敵を進めている。次に、BSQ2を別の方向に発艦させ、索敵範囲を広げる。空母は予定通り北西に移動し続ける。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 15}, "launch_target": {"x": 7, "y": 7}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (7, 7) while at (18, 14).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (18, 15), en route to target (18, 15), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (16, 12), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (18, 14), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "BSQ1とBSQ2はそれぞれ異なる方向に向かって索敵を行っている。敵空母の位置を特定するため、引き続き索敵を続ける。空母は現在の位置を維持し、索敵結果を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

{"thinking": "BSQ1とBSQ2は順調に索敵を進めている。敵空母の位置を特定するため、引き続き索敵を続ける。空母は現在の位置を維持し、索敵結果を待つ。", "action": {"carrier_target": null, "launch_target": null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (12, 10), outbound toward (7, 7), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking": "敵の航空部隊が発見されたが、空母の位置はまだ不明。敵航空部隊の動きから、敵空母は北西の方向にいる可能性が高い。空母を少し北に移動させ、索敵範囲を広げる。BSQ1とBSQ2はそのまま索敵を続行。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 18, "y": 13}, "launch_target": null}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: Carrier target was rejected. x=18 y=13 is not on sea. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=17 y=11.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking": "空母の移動先を修正する必要がある。敵空母の位置を特定するため、空母を北西に移動させる。", "action": {"carrier_target": {"x": 17, "y": 11}, "launch_target": null}}
